Key Match Events: Pakistan won by 7 wickets (with 15 balls remaining)
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan need to do the heavy-lifting up top
Canada has shown they have both the hunger and the ability to trouble most in group A
Nicholas Kirton has shown the personality and quality to perform on the big stage
Post-Match Reflections: Azhar Mahmood does not expect any of the Pakistan players to be complacent against Canada
Aaron Johnson feels the New York pitch makes it a level playing field for Canada
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan need more from the batters
Babar's dry run at T20 World Cups since the start of the 2022 edition continues
Only three players have scored more runs than Kirton's 100 at this T20 World Cup
Others: The match was played on a fresh surface on the cards
Rain delayed the start of the India-Pakistan clash in New York, but no weather interruptions are expected on Tuesday
